title: Killer Beauty
description:
We live in a society where too much emphasis is placed on external beauty. On the daily, seeds are planted to make us obsess over appearance and posts on social media above everything else. Bit don't obsess too much over what you see in a mirror, make sure that what's spiritually and morally inside of you also gets that invigorating cleanse. Otherwise, those planted seeds will rot and that outer influence will grow, that inner evil is bound to come out. 

First, obsession will kill you
Followed by a offer to good to be true
Then, this way a monster comes
Finally in our featured story, 7 years bad luck. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
